新药输送系统显示出治疗绒毛膜瘤的希望一种新的药物输送系统显示出有望治疗一种罕见的，侵略性的癌症，影响孕妇和新妈妈，并且与其他癌症也有潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/new-drug-delive-system-shows-shows-promise-formise-for-wareating-choriocarcinoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/new-drug-delivery-system-shows-shows-promise-formise-for-treating-choriocarcinoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=804ae6f7-f896-4e1a-8a72-4d4c0241E499 Thu, 06 Feb 2025 09:14:52 -0500 New drug delivery system shows promise for treating choriocarcinoma
